mapper.insert: insert into mate_reply (rno, no, reply, replyer,user_id) values (seq_matereply.nextval,#{no}, #{reply},#{replyer},#{user_id})
mapper.update: update mate_reply set reply = #{reply}, replydate=sysdate where rno=#{rno}
update mate set replyCnt = replycnt+1 where no=#{no}
update mate set replyCnt = replycnt-1 where no=#{no}
